label: 太政官
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: Also pronounced Daijōkan.  In charge of all matters of state, being the supreme organ of the government, responsible directly to the Sovereign (Tennō). Only the Department of Shintō (Jingikan) was free from its control. [天皇、神道、神祇官]
